text: KPPS-LP (97.5 FM) is a radio station licensed to St. Louis Park, Minnesota, United States. The station is currently owned by Park Public Radio, Inc. The station has a construction permit to move to a slightly different location and change frequencies to 88.9. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Radio stations in Minnesota Category:Low-power FM radio stations in Minnesota Category:Radio stations established in 2016 Category:2016 establishments in Minnesota
title: KPPS-LP
